verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Akasamandu nivuṇḍaga, nenu evariki bhayapadanu Nivilokamulo nakundaga nenu deniki bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satru samuhamu nannu chuttina, saitanudu sanharimpa jusina Na sahavasiga nivundaga nenu evariki bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vyadhulu, karuvulu shodhanalu, badhalu duhkhamu vedanalu, Maranamu mringaga kankshinchina, nenu deniki bhayapaḍanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahimaisvaryamu vaibhavamu, mahimanandamu maranivi, Na prabhu kriste nakundaga, nenu evariki bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Na tirmanamu ne chesiti, na prabhu yesunu nammitini Anubhava michunu aa prabhuve, nenu evariki bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Padipoyina venukanja veyaka, paschattapamu padi adugu Ninnu kshaminchunu ni prabhuve, nivu evariki bhayapadavu{/lang-eng}
